name: Panasonic RAW Image
summary: An RW2 file is a camera raw image captured by a Panasonic LUMIX digital camera, such as the LX3 and LX5. It stores image data in a format based on the TIFF specification similar to .RAW and .RWL formats. Various image editors can open, edit, and convert RW2 files, including Adobe Photoshop Elements, Apple Preview, and XnViewMP.
